Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "+addshout is a simple command that will connect two areas so you can hear shouts/yells/announcings between them. There are four items of information needed: \\r\\n\\r\\nFirst woe name - the first room woe:name. It does not matter which order you enter the rooms.\\r\\n\\r\\nFirst Detail name - the detail ID (what appears between the [ ] in Karmode) for the first room. This will be what the shout comes from.\\r\\n\\r\\nSecond woe name\\r\\n\\r\\nSecond Detail name\\r\\n\\r\\n"

"When you submit the information, you will get this type of thing Emitted to your client window:\\r\\n\\r\\n[Add Shout] the dark, cold old dungeon's detail \\"hole\\" has been connected for shouting to the old basement's detail \\"well\\".\\r\\n"
"Usage: [ +addshout ]\\r\\n\\r\\nUse: [ +addshout help ] for a general description of the command."
